text: Han Yuzhen (, (1942–1979), also romanized as Han Yu-chen, was a female Chinese former international table tennis player. ==Table tennis career== She won three medals at the 1961 World Table Tennis Championships; two silver medals in the women's team and mixed doubles with Li Furong and a bronze medal in the women's doubles with Liang Lizhen. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:Chinese female table tennis players Category:1979 deaths Category:1942 births Category:Table tennis players from Harbin Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: Han Yuzhen
